text: The 1998 NFL Europe season was the 6th season in 8 years of the American Football league that started out as the World League of American Football. 1998 was the first season the league was known as NFL Europe. The London Monarchs changed their names to the England Monarchs for the 1998 season. ==World Bowl '98== Rhein 34-10 Frankfurt Sunday, June 14, 1998 Waldstadion Frankfurt, Germany Category:1998 in American football Category:NFL Europe (WLAF) seasons
title: 1998 NFL Europe season
